name: Just one more episode
profile:
Once, while watching a show on TV, my mum said to me: "You know, it's more entertaining to watch you watching this that the show itself". And that's how the channel was born. 

Jokes aside, I just really enjoy making these videos and sharing my thoughts and opinions with all of you. I love the community that we've created on here and I appreciate all the support! 

Francesca
